data.quote: The lives of great men do not end with the grave. They just begin.
data.author: Rev. Gerald L.K. Smith

data.quote: Why worry? If you've done the very best you can, worrying won't make it only better.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: Common people are often enough; that is why God made so many of them. Your job is to be— EXTRAORDINARY.
data.author: Shannon L. Alder

data.quote: As long as you're learning, you're not failing.
data.author: Bob Ross

data.quote: You've been criticizing yourself for years and it hasn't worked.  Try accepting yourself and se what happens.
data.author: Louise Hay

data.quote: Time's up.  Lets's do this.
data.author: Leeroy Jenkins

data.quote: Start
data.author: Tommy Wiseau

data.quote: You believed in Santa for 8 years, you can believe in yourself for 10 seconds.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
data.author: Joseph Campbell

data.quote: Never make your home in a place. Make a home for yourself inside your own head. You'll find what you need to furnish it--memory, friends you can trust, love of learning, and other such things. That way it will go with you wherever you journey.
data.author: Ted Williams

data.quote: Memories, even bittersweet ones, are better than nothing.
data.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

data.quote: Celebrate your successes. Find some humor in your failures.
data.author: Sam Walton

data.quote: Swim upstream. Go the other way. Ignore the conventional wisdom.
data.author: Sam Walton

data.quote: Say not always what you know, but always know what you say.
data.author: Tiberius Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus

data.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
data.author: Gandalf

data.quote: What we do in life echoes in eternity.
data.author: Maximus

data.quote: The purpose of life is finding the largest burden that you can bear and bearing it.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: Greatness and madness are next door neighbors and they often borrow each other’s sugar.
data.author: Joe Rogan

data.quote: Excellence in anything increases your potential in everything.
data.author: Joe Rogan

data.quote: Wisdom requires a flexible mind.
data.author: Dan Carlin
